Author: Whitepetticoat
Text: Hmm that does make sense as I haven’t been drinking as much water lately. It is taking me a while to adjust to the physical changes.

Author: loversalibi
Text: it’s probably water retention. i can stay the same number on the scale but suddenly have cellulite for seemingly no reason and it’s always bc i’ve been eating a lot of sodium and/or not drinking enough water. if you live in a part of the world that is hot right now, i wouldn’t be surprised if this was to blame!
